DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , randomize , control study cryoablation v medical management treatment PAF
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose prospective , randomized multi-center clinical study establish benefit CryoCor ( TM ) Cardiac Cryoablation System treat symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation ( PAF ) comparison treatment anti-arrhythmic medication alone . This study also evaluate safety profile CryoCor ( TM ) Cardiac Cryoablation System use setting .
DOC.criteria: At least 3 episode PAF within 6 month Refractory least one drug Therapeutic anticoagulation Signed informed consent Persistent AF Structural heart disease Prior ablation Contraindication present
